痑字的基本解释

痑
tān
疲乏：“压得那马背郎当，担夫痑软。”

痑
shǐ
众多。
自放纵。

痑字的汉语字典释义

[①]［tān］
［《廣韻》他干切，平寒，透。］
［《廣韻》託何切，平歌，透。］
［《廣韻》丁佐切，去箇，端。］
(1)疲乏；劳累。
(2)特指瘫软。
[②]［shǐ］
［《集韻》賞是切，上紙，書。］
(1)众多貌。
(2)自放纵。

痑字的康熙字典解释

【午集中】【疒字部】　痑； 康熙笔画：11； 页码：页772第30
【唐韻】丁可切，音嚲。【說文】馬病也。引《詩·小雅》：痑痑駱馬。○按《詩》今本作嘽。【玉篇】力極也。【博雅】痑痑，疲也。　又【廣韻】丁佐切【集韻】丁賀切，?音跢。又【廣韻】【集韻】?他干切，音?。又【集韻】他佐切，音拕。又湯河切，音佗。又他案切，音炭。義?同。　又【集韻】賞是切，弛上聲。【前漢·司馬相如傳】衍曼流爛，痑以陸離。【註】張揖曰：痑，眾貌。師古曰：痑，自放縱也。音式爾反。

痑字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
痑字的起名意思

暂无。

Basic explanation of words
痑
tān
Tiredness: "It's too heavy to be on horseback, and the husband is weak."
痑
shǐ
numerous.
Self-indulgence.

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［tān］
["Guangyun" he cuts dry, calms down, and thoroughly. ]
["Guangyun" support where to cut, flat song, through. ]
["Guangyun" Ding Zuoqie, go to Xie, end. ]
(1) Tired; tired.
(2) Especially refers to paralysis.
[②] [shǐ]
["Jiyun" appreciation is cut, paper, book. ]
(1) Many appearances.
(2) Self-indulgence.

[Afternoon Concentration] [The Department of Sui Characters] 　痑; Kangxi Strokes: 11; Page Number: Page 772 30
[Tang Yun] Ding Keqie, the sound is different. [Said the text] Horse disease also. Quote from "Poetry Xiaoya": Llama Llama. ○ Press "Poetry" for this edition. [Jade articles] Extremely powerful. [Bo Ya] You are tired and tired.　[Guangyun] Ding Zuoqie [Jiyun] Ding Heqie,? The sound is stomped. [Guang Yun] [Ji Yun] again? He cuts, the sound? Also 【Jiyun】He Zuoqie, Yinhuan. Tanghe cut again, sound tuo. He cut the case again, Yin Tan. Righteous? Same.　[Jiyun] Appreciation is cutting, relaxing on the sound. [Previous Han·Sima Xiangru Chuan] Yanman was in a rotten state, and he was utterly ridiculous. [Note] Zhang Yi said: 痑, all appearances. Shi Gu said: 痑, self-indulgence. The sound style is reversed.
